title: Perfectbaby
author: Perfectbaby
content: We all had heard of the sudden lawsuit against Binance exchange and its CEO Changpeng Zhao which has caused so much threat to the bitcoin and cryptocurrency at large. Do you strongly believe that this is the good time acquire some useful currencies?Like buying Bitcoin, ETH BNB and many more.I am having a plan to buy some valuable asset and store in my wallet since i believe after few week or month we might get back to $27k. Wetin una think so that i no go waste my money at this point go buy bitcoin wey market come dey show me sheggea.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: Firstly, no risk no reward. The market speculation shouldn't deter anyone from buying crypto. What matters is the kind of cryptocurrency you buy, if one intends to trade with it, if one intends to commit to a DCA strategy of investment for a duration or overlooking a time as this or when an event like the Halving, which is expected to also happen.The simple fact is, you can't always win. An asset or security like BTC is recognized and accepted as more stable, and as such, it is okay to buy whenever you got the cash. Mostly if you trade with it.Â Right now it is almost at 27k, people are still buying. It depends on what you want finally.The news on air right now is directed at exchanges not cryptocurrency. One should be wise to know which crypto is worth buying still.

So much threat as how? Op do you really understand what is bitcoin? Ok let me give small break down of bitcoin. Bitcoin an internet currency which can be used to buy and sell things only online not offline. But the goods and services can be physical but the payment is online. Now what is Binance? Binance is an internet commercial Bank where one can store his bitcoin and any other Cryptocurrencies. And they are own by different people. So the downfall of Binance does not affect bitcoin.
